title: Such a fun time in the Big Apple!
text: Five of us gathered to celebrate our sister's 50th birthday and booked the two-bedroom suite. Wow! It was enormous - 2 good sized bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, huge sitting area with desk, sofa, stuffed chair, table & chairs for 4 plus a mini kitchen with microwave, fridge, and sink. The staff was so friendly and welcoming, especially bellhop David and the main doorman (sorry can't remember his name). We had a slight issue with cleanliness of the pullout couch and they were accommodating. The free wine hour is a nice touch, we enjoyed it almost every night. The only slightly annoying thing is the $10 credit at the "market" in the lobby that you have to "use or lose" each day. A bottle of smartwater was $9.60. But overall a fun place in a good location. We also stayed in a regular 2-queen room that was also very nice - clean, comfortable, stylish. Would definitely recommend!
